comments.author: Sahne Teebeutel

comments.text:
After crying for hours, I realized that is a really good opportunity for 
Taewoon~ He can write and produce pop songs well, but he's better with rap 
and deep songs, so I think he was staying in SPEED for royalty, his 
long-time friendship with Jungwoo and Sungmin, the promise with all of them 
before their debut and his tag as SPEED's leader, I'll miss him in the 
group as well as a DEEPS I am, but I hope he success in SMTM4, a lot of 
rappers got recognition from there, he might get it too, It'll be good if 
people stop call him "Zico's brother" and recognize his talents [just 
talking in general] . I hope so, and I also hope people to keep supporting 
SPEED, they're still talented without a member.
comments.author: Estefanía Orange McCartney

comments.text:
0:35 Jongkook: Main Vocalist
0:41 Yuhwan: 3rd and acrobatic dancer, vocalist
0:48 Sejoon: Rapper and visual
1:07 TaeHa: vocalist, 2nd dancer and cutie~
1:39 Sungmin: Maknae, rapper, sub-vocalist and main dancer
1:49 TaeWoon: Leader, main rapper, sub-vocalist (and sometimes producer)
2:51 JungWoo: Main vocalist

hope it helps~
